leads.description: AI21 Labs develops advanced language AI models and APIs, including Jurassic-1, one of the world's largest language models. Their AI-powered writing tools and APIs are used by developers and enterprises worldwide for content generation, summarization, and language understanding.

Datagen creates hyperrealistic synthetic data for computer vision AI training, enabling companies to develop and test computer vision systems with photorealistic synthetic data. Their platform serves major tech companies and autonomous vehicle manufacturers.

Forter provides real-time fraud prevention for e-commerce using advanced AI and machine learning. Their platform processes billions of transactions annually, requiring robust security, authentication, and compliance measures to protect sensitive financial data.
